viral_protein.description: total assembled sets of viral protein

virion_uncoating_rate.description: rate at which an internalized virion is uncoated

uncoated_to_RNA_rate.description: rate at which uncoated virion makes its mRNA available

protein_synthesis_rate.description: rate at mRNA creates complete set of proteins

virion_assembly_rate.description: rate at which viral proteins are assembled into complete virion

virion_export_rate.description: rate at which a virion is exported from a live cell

unbound_external_ACE2.description: initial number of unbound ACE2 receptors on surface

bound_external_ACE2.description: initial number of bound ACE2 receptors on surface

unbound_internal_ACE2.description: initial number of internalized unbound ACE2 receptors

bound_internal_ACE2.description: initial number of internalized bound ACE2 receptors

max_infected_apoptosis_rate.description: maximum rate of cell apoptosis due to viral infection

max_apoptosis_half_max.description: viral load at which cells reach half max apoptosis rate

apoptosis_hill_power.description: Hill power for viral load apoptosis response

virus_fraction_released_at_death.description: fraction of internal virus released at cell death

infected_cell_chemokine_secretion_rate.description: max rate that infected cells secrete chemokine

debris_secretion_rate.description: rate that dead cells release debris

infected_cell_chemokine_secretion_activa.description: used internally to track activation of chemokine secretion

internalised_pro_pyroptosis_cytokine.description: used internally to track pro-pyroptotic cytokine concentration

interferon_secretion_rate_via_infection.description: Type-1 interferon secretion rate for infected cells

max_interferon_secretion_rate_via_paracr.description: Type-1 interferon secretion rate after activation by Type-1 interferon

interferon_max_response_threshold.description: Interferon response scales linearly until Int-1 exceeds this threshold

interferon_activation.description: Current interferon signaling activation state (between 0 and 1)

interferon_max_virus_inhibition.description: At max interferon activation, max inhibition of viral replication (between 0 and 1)

interferon_viral_RNA_threshold.description: infected cell interferon secretion saturates at this viral RNA level

interferon_viral_RNA_detection.description: infected cell interferon secretion starts at this viral RNA level

TCell_detection.description: protein value at which a T Cell can detect an infected cell

TCell_contact_time.description: tracks total contact time with CD8 T cells

cell_attachment_rate.description: the rate at which the cell attaches to cells in contact

cell_attachment_lifetime.description: the mean duration of a cell-cell attachment

TCell_contact_death_threshold.description: threshold CD8 T cell contact time to trigger apoptosis

max_attachment_distance.desription: max distance at which to form a cell-cell attachment

time_to_next_phagocytosis.description: time it takes for the apoptotic material to be phagocytosed

material_internalisation_rate.desription: rate material is ingested by phagocyte

ability_to_phagocytose_infected_cell.description: Boolean for whether macrophages can phagocytose infected cells

time_of_DC_departure.description: Time DC leaves tissue after activation

phagocytosis_rate.desription: rate of phagocytosing a nearby target

phagocytosis_relative_target_cutoff_size.desription: do not phagocytose anything over this size (relative to cell's volume)

sensitivity_to_debris_chemotaxis.description: relative sensitivity to debris in chemotaxis

sensitivity_to_chemokine_chemotaxis.description: relative sensitivity to chemokine in chemotaxis

activated_cytokine_secretion_rate.description: rate of secreting pro-inflamatory cytokine after activation

activated_immune_cell.description: used internally to track activation state

antiinflammatory_cytokine_secretion_rate.description: secretion rate of anti-inflammatory from infected epithelium cell
secretion rate of anti-inflammatory from macrophage

collagen_secretion_rate.description: secretion rate of collagen from fibroblast

phagocytosis_rate.desription: rate of phagocytosing a nearby target

sensitivity_to_debris_chemotaxis.description: relative sensitivity to debris in chemotaxis

sensitivity_to_chemokine_chemotaxis.description: relative sensitivity to chemokine in chemotaxis

activated_cytokine_secretion_rate.description: rate of secreting pro-inflamatory cytokine after activation

phagocytosis_rate.desription: rate of phagocytosing a nearby target

sensitivity_to_debris_chemotaxis.description: relative sensitivity to debris in chemotaxis

sensitivity_to_chemokine_chemotaxis.description: relative sensitivity to chemokine in chemotaxis

activated_cytokine_secretion_rate.description: rate of secreting pro-inflamatory cytokine after activation

immune_dt.description: how often we check to introduce immune cells

immune_z_offset.description: immune cell position over the epithelium

macrophage_max_recruitment_rate.description: max macrophage recruitment rate (for saturated signal)

neutrophil_max_recruitment_rate.description: max neutrophil recruitment rate (for saturated signal)

DC_max_recruitment_rate.description: max DC recruitment rate (for saturated signal)

T_Cell_Recruitment.description: T cell recruitment rate to tissue

DC_leave_prob.description: probability of DC leaving to lymph node

fibroblast_max_recruitment_rate.description: max fibroblast cell recruitment rate (for saturated signal)

fibroblast_recruitment_min_signal.description: min concentration to attract fibroblast cells

fibroblast_recruitment_saturation_signal.description: saturating concentration to attract fibroblast cells

multiplicity_of_infection.description: multiplicity of infection: virions/cells at t=0

use_single_infected_cell.description: Infect center cell with one virion (overrides MOI)

number_of_CD8_Tcells.description: initial number of CD8 T cells in tissue

number_of_CD4_Tcells.description: initial number of CD4 Tcells in tissue

virions_needed_for_DC_activation.descriptions: Number of virions needed to activate DC

epsilon_distance.descriptions: Multiple of interaction distance for immune cells

perecentage_tissue_vascularized.description: percentage of tissue sitting above blood vessels

color_variable.description: color cells based on this variable

phagocytes_virus_uptake_rate.description: Rate that phagocytes uptake virus after activation

Antibody_binding_rate.description: Binding rate of antibody to infected cells

antibody_half_effect.description: Half effect of antibody on macrophage phagocytosis
